is a beautiful village in the state of

. 
Here, all religious people live together as one family.
The village is a 45 Min drive from Thirunelveli and a 30 min drive from Nagercoil,
and has a well connected road network and rail network.
Kavalkinaru is a symbol of unity. 
More than 10,000 people live here. In the centre of the village we have a church (Sacred Heart Church). 
Moreover, Kavalkinaru has two big ponds. 
One monsoon both of these were filled and the water is used for agriculture.
Kavalkinaru has a rock in the outer of the village called as Pothai. 
A certain percentage of the people spend their life by working in this rock.

Since Kavalkinaru has more schools and colleges this village is well educated. 
Every one in the village is educated. After completing their studies, most of the people goes to abroad, Mumbai and Chennai, for their career and 
financial growth. The young generation sets their career in rig, software & BPO industry. Every one is assembled at Kavalkinaru in the month of may. Since we celebrate Sacred Heart church festival very grandly every year in May as well, this is the holiday for schools.

Once upon a time this village was the boundary of the kingdoms of the Cheras, Cholas and Pandiyas. 
So, it had an inn and well for the guarding soldiers, which became the cause of the name 
of Kavalkinaru.

Kavalkinaru is located in Tirunelveli district. 
Kavalkinaru Junction is in the highway of Kanniyakumar to Kashmir. 
Kavalkinaru is about 20 kilometer from Kanniyakumari. 
Kavalkinaru is in the border of Tirunelveli and Kanniyakumari district. 


DISTANCE-CITY to KAVALKINARU

Trivandrum to Kavalkinaru

Distance: 86 Km
Journey Time: 2.5 hours
Route: The route is Thiruvanantthapuram- NagerKovil

Tirunelvelli to Kavalkinaru

Distance: 71 Km
Route: Tirunelveli – Nanguneri- Valliyoo- Kavalkinaru

Chennai to Kavalkinaru

Distance: 691 Km
Route: The route from Chennai to Kavalkinaru
1) Chennai to Villupuram (160 kms)
2)Villupuram to Trichy (160 kms)
3)Trichy to Madurai (140 kms)
4)Madurai to Tirunelveli (140 kms)
5) Tiruvenveli to Kavalkinaru(71kms)
Travel Time: 12 – 13 hours (approx)

Tiruchendur to Kavalkinaru

Distance: 68 Km
Route:Tiruchendur-Valliyoor- Kavalkinaru
